Articles.Content:
300th post in the thread!

Early version of my DTV:

![eewROKF.png](http://i.imgur.com/eewROKF.png)

> 
> 300th post in the thread!
> Early version of my DTV:

How time flies! Also, do I recognize that hab? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Much better dude. How's the rest coming along?

The Duna Hab is still under the de-modding process (Un-tweakscaling then adding moar struts+girders), the Orion and Ares are done (Will post pics soon), and I am working on the Altair. I posted my Copernicus DTV a bit back.

EDIT: redoing the SPR, again!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-20T21:21:54Z" title="06/20/2015 09:21  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 20, 2015</time> by Rolanvorxariat**

> 
> How time flies! Also, do I recognize that hab? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yes, you do recognize that, I used your intake trick. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Am I the only one who sometimes thinks: "Is anyone actually going to fly my mission? I might as well just not test it." Then I go ahead and test it, because I don't want to release a bad product. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

No, not the Government Funding Machine!

Ah, the pain of the burn:

![quzkUa2.png](http://i.imgur.com/quzkUa2.png)

Where is everyone right now? (I mean in dev of their packs.)
Taking a break. I got lots of RL stuff to do ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

I'm plodding along. Found some bugs with one of the landers..

 Fixing that, and I rebuilt the Atlas V, testing that with every piece of cargo. Then test DTV. Ect ect. 

You guys beginning to see how much there is to do!

> 
> I'm plodding along. Found some bugs with one of the landers..
>  Fixing that, and I rebuilt the Atlas V, testing that with every piece of cargo. Then test DTV. Ect ect. 
> 
> You guys beginning to see how much there is to do!

Yes, I do see, I've been testing the DTV for hours, just burning out of LKO.

> 
> Yes, I do see, I've been testing the DTV for hours, just burning out of LKO.

Ouch. How long is the burn to Duna for you?

> 
> Ouch. How long is the burn to Duna for you?

Way to long. Actually, I'm not sure, but it's very slow.

> 
> Way to long. Actually, I'm not sure, but it's very slow.

Are you going round and then burning again or all in one go?

> 
> Are you going round and then burning again or all in one go?

All in one go.

I think my old DTV transfer was around 15 mins. It will be longer with this new one..

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-22T01:48:41Z" title="06/22/2015 01:48  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 22, 2015</time> by Majorjim**

> 
> I think my old DTV transfer was around 15 mins. It will be longer with this new one..

The flight time is about 1 hour, but it only records a second every five, because of lag. However, I was able to 2x warp for a fair portion of the burn.

> 
> Taking a break. I got lots of RL stuff to do ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

Your new kitty?

Hobbes is very cute.

> 
> Your new kitty?
> Hobbes is very cute.

You guessed it! She's sitting on my chest as I type.

Ack! My Ares V just cannot get enough thrust!

i am using a mainsail, 4 reliants, and 4 of the radial engines. It can get to orbit, without a payload, but with one...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-22T14:53:52Z" title="06/22/2015 02:53  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 22, 2015</time> by Rolanvorxariat**

> 
> Acid! My Ares V just cannot get enough thrust!
> i am using a mainsail, 4 reliants, and 4 of the radial engines. It can get to orbit, without a payload, but with one...

Can you shed any weight? Add more boosters? The stock boosters are rubbish individually, bunch them together.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> You guessed it! She's sitting on my chest as I type.

Squweeee! Can I has photo?

> 
> Squweeee! Can I has photo?

![RQfJoIE.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/RQfJoIE.jpg)

> 
> I've shown her off elsewhere on the forums, but here you are ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> [http://i.imgur.com/RQfJoIE.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/RQfJoIE.jpg)

Don't forget to get it some proper care, vet check, injections ect.

> 
> The flight time is about 1 hour, but it only records a second every five, because of lag. However, I was able to 2x warp for a fair portion of the burn.

[sarcasm]

Yay! 1.0.3 is out, so I can redo that 5 hour burn! Fun!

[/sarcasm]
